channel.title: Pure-Ownage_Pkz 508 Development
channel.description:
Alright, im starting a new server, Names Pure-Ownage_Pkz, The base im using is the second realse of Z508 From-Z508Z great base thank you, Anyways ill let you in on what im doing, [size=14pt][b]sorry dont have any pictures at the moment dont have time but will sure have them in the next few days![/b][/size]
Features:
-Added Multi Pking (Faladoor Middle) -Added Coustom Pvp Ranks Starting At 100 ending at 7500 I belives, The only way you get rare items (Phats/Santas/H'weens) -Changed Starting Area (Varrock Middle) Also has 2 Guys right beside eachother saying Welcome to Pure-Ownage_Pkz -Added Vesta/Morrgians/Donater amulet/Donater Cape All this for donaters -Added Donater Zone -Changed Bonus's for a few weapons (They Were over powered) -Changed spawning no need for money to spawn anymore -Added a few commands like ::master & ::pure
Thats all that i have added/Fixed so far still have a few plans on what i should do with the source, just dont no how at the moment but im learning still only my second server for 508, even though going from 317 to 508 aint much of a diffrence, but hopefully this goes better then my first 508!
[size=14pt][b]When i get pictures up you should let me no how im doing!![/b][/size]

item.title: Pure-Ownage_Pkz 508 Development
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Bryan Owner_Bryan
item.description:
@Owner_Bryan wrote:

k1ng0frs:

haven’t seen any 508 Development btw post some pics

Pictures coming soon, Sorry, i really havnt had time to take pictures let alone work on the server the past 2 days with school and work after i get the weekend off so, ill be working more on this project then! Keep searching this, and one of the times you will get to see pictures! Thanks for the comments! And replys if anyone have idea for the spawn pking server could you let me no?

Read full topic

item.title: Pure-Ownage_Pkz 508 Development
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Bryan Owner_Bryan
item.description:
@Owner_Bryan wrote:

Alright, im starting a new server, Names Pure-Ownage_Pkz, The base im using is the second realse of Z508 From-Z508Z great base thank you, Anyways ill let you in on what im doing, [size=14pt]sorry dont have any pictures at the moment dont have time but will sure have them in the next few days![/size]

Features:

-Added Multi Pking (Faladoor Middle)
-Added Coustom Pvp Ranks Starting At 100 ending at 7500 I belives, The only way you get rare items (Phats/Santas/H’weens)
-Changed Starting Area (Varrock Middle) Also has 2 Guys right beside eachother saying Welcome to Pure-Ownage_Pkz
-Added Vesta/Morrgians/Donater amulet/Donater Cape All this for donaters
-Added Donater Zone
-Changed Bonus’s for a few weapons (They Were over powered)
-Changed spawning no need for money to spawn anymore
-Added a few commands like ::master & ::pure

Thats all that i have added/Fixed so far still have a few plans on what i should do with the source, just dont no how at the moment but im learning still only my second server for 508, even though going from 317 to 508 aint much of a diffrence, but hopefully this goes better then my first 508!

[size=14pt]When i get pictures up you should let me no how im doing!![/size]

Read full topic
